statements: SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trade_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY trade_price ASC
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol FROM trades
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY trade_id
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_symbol='AAPL';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100 AND trade_quantity <= 500;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_quantity ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_type, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_data;
SELECT * FROM trade_data WHERE trade_quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_id, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_data WHERE trade_type = 'Buy';
SELECT trade_date, trade_quantity FROM trade_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT confirmation_id, trade_id, confirmation_date, confirmed_by, confirmation_status FROM trade_confirmation WHERE confirmation_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM trade_data WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_price DESC, trade_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_data WHERE trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_quantity ASC, trade_price DESC;
SELECT trade_id, confirmation_date, confirmed_by, confirmation_status FROM trade_confirmation WHERE confirmation_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY confirmation_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_data WHERE trade_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY trade_type ASC;
SELECT MAX(trade_price) AS max_price, MIN(trade_price) AS min_price FROM trade_data;
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, security_symbol, quantity, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 123;
SELECT security_symbol, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM trade_confirmations ORDER BY confirmation_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, confirmed_quantity, confirmed_amount FROM trade_confirmations WHERE confirmed_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT security_symbol, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.trade_id, t.quantity, tc.confirmed_quantity FROM trades t JOIN trade_confirmations tc ON t.trade_id = tc.trade_id WHERE t.quantity >= 500 AND tc.confirmed_amount > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, security_symbol, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT t.security_symbol, tc.confirmed_amount, rl.result FROM trades t JOIN trade_confirmations tc ON t.trade_id = tc.trade_id JOIN reconciliation_logs rl ON rl.trade_id = tc.trade_id;
SELECT * FROM trade_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol FROM trade_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' OR symbol='MSFT';
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_log WHERE comparison_result LIKE '%matched%' AND reconciliation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT confirmation_id, trade_id, confirmation_date FROM external_trade_confirmation WHERE is_confirmed = true ORDER BY confirmation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_value FROM trade_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT t.trade_id, t.symbol, c.is_confirmed FROM trade_data t JOIN external_trade_confirmation c ON t.trade_id = c.trade_id WHERE c.is_confirmed = TRUE ORDER BY t.trade_id;

SELECT l.log_id, l.comparison_result, d.discrepancy_description FROM reconciliation_log l JOIN trade_discrepancies d ON l.log_id = d.log_id WHERE d.resolution_status = 'Open' ORDER BY l.reconciliation_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.trade_id, t.trade_date, t.symbol, r.comparison_result FROM trade_data t LEFT JOIN reconciliation_log r ON t.trade_id = r.trade_id WHERE r.comparison_result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.trade_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_data WHERE trade_id = 1;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM confirmation_records WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol FROM trade_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT confirmation_id, confirmation_date, symbol FROM confirmation_records WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT reconciliation_id, status FROM trade_reconciliation WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM trade_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, quantity FROM trade_data WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM confirmation_records GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT trade_id, confirmation_id, status, notes FROM trade_reconciliation WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY reconciliation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
